name: Comet Season 2020
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

You and your friends are a crew of astronomers aboard a train to a fallen comet in the distance. Pilot, build, shoot, but above all cooperate to defend your convoy against hordes of monsters that have come to stand in your way!

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity 3D
Number of players: 2 à 4

Producer: Thibaud Simon
Game Art: Marine Cadoret, Sottheavid Chhuon, Solène Michon & François Le Normand
Game Design: Antoine Thiebaut & Maxime Husson
Game Design & Programming: Sébastien Raymondaud & Hugo Dommergues
Game Programming: Etienne Farman
Music & Sound Design: Baptiste Belot
